00034  * All RTCP state is stored in this module and state management functions
00035  * are also implemented in this module.

00052 #include <sys/types.h>
00053 #include <glib.h>
00054 
00055 #ifndef _RTP_H_
00056 #define _RTP_H_
00057 
00058 /*
00059  * The type definitions below are valid for 32-bit architectures and
00060  * may have to be adjusted for 16- or 64-bit architectures.
00061  */
00062 #if 0
00063 typedef unsigned char  u_int8_t;
00064 typedef unsigned short u_int16_t;
00065 typedef unsigned int   u_int32_t;
00066 typedef          short int16;
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 /*
00070  * Current protocol version.
00071  */
00072 #define RTP_VERSION    2
00073 
00074 #define RTP_SEQ_MOD (1<<16)
00075 #define RTP_MAX_SDES 255      /* maximum text length for SDES */
00076 
00077 typedef enum {
00078     RTCP_SR   = 200,
00079     RTCP_RR   = 201,
00080     RTCP_SDES = 202,
00081     RTCP_BYE  = 203,
00082     RTCP_APP  = 204
00083 } rtcp_type_t;
00084 
00085 typedef enum {
00086     RTCP_SDES_END   = 0,
00087     RTCP_SDES_CNAME = 1,
00088     RTCP_SDES_NAME  = 2,
00089     RTCP_SDES_EMAIL = 3,
00090     RTCP_SDES_PHONE = 4,
00091     RTCP_SDES_LOC   = 5,
00092     RTCP_SDES_TOOL  = 6,
00093     RTCP_SDES_NOTE  = 7,
00094     RTCP_SDES_PRIV  = 8
00095 } rtcp_sdes_type_t;
00096 
00097 /*
00098  * RTP data header
00099  */
00100 typedef struct {
00101     unsigned int version:2;   /* protocol version */
00102     unsigned int p:1;         /* padding flag */
00103     unsigned int x:1;         /* header extension flag */
00104     unsigned int cc:4;        /* CSRC count */
00105     unsigned int m:1;         /* marker bit */
00106     unsigned int pt:7;        /* payload type */
00107     unsigned int seq:16;      /* sequence number */
00108     u_int32_t ts;               /* timestamp */
00109     u_int32_t ssrc;             /* synchronization source */
00110     u_int32_t csrc[1];          /* optional CSRC list */
00111 } rtp_hdr_t;
00112 
00113 /*
00114  * RTCP common header word
00115  */
00116 typedef struct {
00117     unsigned int version:2;   /* protocol version */
00118     unsigned int p:1;         /* padding flag */
00119     unsigned int count:5;     /* varies by packet type */
00120     unsigned int pt:8;        /* RTCP packet type */
00121     u_int16_t length;           /* pkt len in words, w/o this word */
00122 } rtcp_common_t;
00123 
00124 /*
00125  * Big-endian mask for version, padding bit and packet type pair
00126  */
00127 /*
00128 #define RTCP_VALID_MASK (0xc000 | 0x2000 | 0xfe)
00129 #define RTCP_VALID_VALUE ((RTP_VERSION << 14) | RTCP_SR)
00130 */
00131 #define RTCP_VALID_MASK         (0xc0000000 | 0x0f000000)
00132 #define RTCP_VALID_VALUE        (0x80000000)
00133 #define RTCP_VALID_SR           (0x80000000 | (RTCP_SR<<16))
00134 #define RTCP_VALID_RR           (0x80000000 | (RTCP_RR<<16))
00135 #define RTCP_VALID_BYE          (0x80000000 | (RTCP_BYE<<16))
00136 
00137 /*
00138  * Reception report block
00139  */
00140 typedef struct {
00141     u_int32_t ssrc;             /* data source being reported */
00142     unsigned int fraction:8;  /* fraction lost since last SR/RR */
00143     int lost:24;              /* cumul. no. pkts lost (signed!) */
00144     u_int32_t last_seq;         /* extended last seq. no. received */
00145     u_int32_t jitter;           /* interarrival jitter */
00146     u_int32_t lsr;              /* last SR packet from this source */
00147     u_int32_t dlsr;             /* delay since last SR packet */
00148 } rtcp_rr_t;
00149 
00150 /*
00151  * SDES item
00152  */
00153 typedef struct {
00154     u_int8_t type;              /* type of item (rtcp_sdes_type_t) */
00155     u_int8_t length;            /* length of item (in octets) */
00156     char data[1];             /* text, not null-terminated */
00157 } rtcp_sdes_item_t;
00158 
00159 /*
00160  * One RTCP packet
00161  */
00162 typedef struct {
00163     rtcp_common_t common;     /* common header */
00164     union {
00165         /* sender report (SR) */
00166         struct {
00167             u_int32_t ssrc;     /* sender generating this report */
00168             u_int32_t ntp_sec;  /* NTP timestamp */
00169             u_int32_t ntp_frac;
00170             u_int32_t rtp_ts;   /* RTP timestamp */
00171             u_int32_t psent;    /* packets sent */
00172             u_int32_t osent;    /* octets sent */
00173             rtcp_rr_t rr[1];  /* variable-length list */
00174         } sr;
00175 
00176         /* reception report (RR) */
00177         struct {
00178             u_int32_t ssrc;     /* receiver generating this report */
00179             rtcp_rr_t rr[1];  /* variable-length list */
00180         } rr;
00181 
00182         /* source description (SDES) */
00183         struct rtcp_sdes {
00184             u_int32_t src;      /* first SSRC/CSRC */
00185             rtcp_sdes_item_t item[1]; /* list of SDES items */
00186         } sdes;
00187 
00188         /* BYE */
00189         struct {
00190             u_int32_t src[1];   /* list of sources */
00191             /* can't express trailing text for reason */
00192         } bye;
00193     } r;
00194 } rtcp_t;
00195 
00196 typedef struct {
00197     u_int8_t* buf;
00198     u_int32_t length;
00199 } rtcp_packet_t;
00200 
00201 typedef struct rtcp_sdes rtcp_sdes_t;
00202 
00203 /*
00204  * Per-source state information
00205  */
00206 typedef struct {
00207     u_int16_t max_seq;        /* highest seq. number seen */
00208     u_int32_t cycles;         /* shifted count of seq. number cycles */
00209     u_int32_t base_seq;       /* base seq number */
00210     u_int32_t bad_seq;        /* last 'bad' seq number + 1 */
00211     u_int32_t probation;      /* sequ. packets till source is valid */
00212     u_int32_t received;       /* packets received */
00213     u_int32_t expected_prior; /* packet expected at last interval */
00214     u_int32_t received_prior; /* packet received at last interval */
00215     u_int32_t transit;        /* relative trans time for prev pkt */
00216     u_int32_t jitter;         /* estimated jitter */
00217     /* ... */
00218 } source;
00219 
00220 /* Scheduling types */
00221 typedef enum {
00222     EVENT_BYE,
00223     EVENT_REPORT
00224 } rtcp_event_type_t;
00225 
00226 typedef struct {
00227     rtcp_event_type_t etype;
00228     u_int32_t sent_packet_size;
00229 } rtcp_event_t;
00230 
00231 typedef enum {
00232     PACKET_RTCP_REPORT,
00233     PACKET_RTP,
00234     PACKET_BYE,
00235     PACKET_INVALID
00236 } rtcp_packet_type_t;
00237 
00243 typedef struct {
00244     u_int32_t ssrc;
00245     gboolean sender;
00246     source src;
00247     rtcp_rr_t rr;
00248 } rtcp_member_t;
00249 
00253 extern const int MAX_DROPOUT;
00254 extern const int MAX_MISORDER;
00255 extern const int MIN_SEQUENTIAL;
00256 
00257 #endif
